author: Kenta Goto
description: This Reverse Martini-style cocktail originally featured a floating salted cherry blossom as a garnish. This is not just for looks, the hint of saltiness it lends this delicate drink replaces the savoury note which an olive typically brings to a Martini.
name: Sakura Martini
recipeIngredient: 2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
